games.name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
games.description: An open-world action role-playing game with a gripping narrative.

games.name: Red Dead Redemption 2
games.description: A Western-themed action-adventure game set in an expansive open world.

games.name: Cyberpunk 2077
games.description: A futuristic open-world role-playing game with a branching narrative.

games.name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
games.description: Embark on a Viking adventure in this action role-playing game.

games.name: FIFA 22
games.description: Experience the latest installment in the popular football simulation series.

games.name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
games.description: An action-adventure game in a vast open world with a focus on exploration.

games.name: Doom Eternal
games.description: A fast-paced first-person shooter with intense combat against demonic forces.

games.name: Minecraft
games.description: A sandbox game that allows players to build and explore virtual worlds.

games.name: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order
games.description: Embark on a journey as a young Jedi in this action-adventure game.

games.name: Spider-Man: Miles Morales
games.description: Swing through the city as Miles Morales in this superhero action-adventure game.
